type: Legendary Creature – Human Avatar Lord Noble
rules_text:
[i]Order of Heroes[/i] – Legendary creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
[i]Call for Aid[/i] – {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is Alfonse & Kiran's power. Reveal any number of legendary creature cards and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
